Database

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Robert, Justin, Magnus this very important class has an instance of every table in the database and is used to access all the various searches needed for the application

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseHelper(java.lang.String pass)
      the constructor that create a connection to all the classes that connect to the database
